name: Radiant Magelight
description: Summon a mote of magelight, revealing stealthed and invisible enemies around you for 5 seconds. Exposed enemies cannot return to stealth or invisibility for 4 seconds.  While slotted you gain Major Savagery and Prophecy, increasing your Weapon and Spell Critical rating by 2629. You also prevent the stun from stealth attacks for you and nearby allies.
effectLines: Increases the radius of the reveal.  You and nearby allies cannot be stunned from sneak attacks while slotted.  Reduces the cost as the ability ranks up.
rawDescription:
Summon a mote of magelight, revealing stealthed and invisible enemies around you for <<1>>. Exposed enemies cannot return to stealth or invisibility for <<2>>.

While slotted you gain <<3>> and Prophecy, increasing your Weapon and Spell Critical rating by <<4>>. You also prevent the stun from stealth attacks for you and nearby allies.
